author: awiner
msg: Some POM work.  Change the version number to "incubator-m1-SNAPSHOT".  Add some more Apache content to the top-level POM.  Add a repository reference to the java.net maven repos, and switch Facelets and EL over to appropriate references there.  We should now be down to only jsf-mock as a non-legit dependency.
